dcl_constantbuffer cb2[7], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb3[1], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb4[3], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb5[19], immediateIndexed
dcl_sampler s0, mode_default
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_input v0.xyz
dcl_input v1.xy
dcl_input v2.xyz
dcl_input v3.x
dcl_input v4.xy
dcl_output_siv o0.xyzw, position
dcl_output o1.xyzw
dcl_output o2.xyzw
dcl_output o3.xyz
dcl_output o4.xyz
dcl_output o5.xyz
dcl_output o6.xyzw
dcl_temps 7

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r6.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

itof r0.xy, v1.xyxx
dp3 r0.z, v2.xyzx, v2.xyzx
rsq r0.z, r0.z
mul o2.xyz, r0.zzzz, v2.xyzx
add r1.xyz, v0.xyzx, -cb0[42].xyzx
dp3 r0.z, -r1.xyzx, -r1.xyzx
sqrt r0.z, r0.z
mul r0.w, r0.z, l(0.031250)
min r0.w, r0.w, l(1.000000)
mad r0.w, r0.w, l(0.375000), cb3[0].x
div r2.xyz, -r1.xyzx, r0.zzzz
mad r2.xyz, r0.wwww, r2.xyzx, v0.xyzx
add r2.xyz, r2.xyzx, -cb0[42].xyzx
mov r2.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r3.x, r2.xyzw, cb0[20].xyzw
dp4 r3.y, r2.xyzw, cb0[21].xyzw
dp4 o0.z, r2.xyzw, cb0[22].xyzw
dp4 r3.w, r2.xyzw, cb0[23].xyzw
mul r0.z, cb2[0].z, l(0.0174532924)
sincos r2.x, r4.x, r0.z
mov r5.x, -r2.x
mad r0.xy, r0.xyxx, l(0.000488296151, 0.000488296151, 0.000000, 0.000000), l(-0.500000, -0.500000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
mov r5.y, r4.x
mov r5.z, r2.x
dp2 r2.x, r0.xyxx, r5.yzyy
dp2 r2.y, r0.xyxx, r5.xyxx
add o6.xy, r2.xyxx, l(0.500000, 0.500000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
add r0.x, -v3.x, cb1[8].y
lt r0.y, r0.x, cb2[5].w
add r0.w, r0.x, -cb2[5].z
mul_sat r0.zw, r0.xxxw, cb2[6].xxxy
add r0.w, -r0.w, l(1.000000)
movc o1.w, r0.y, r0.z, r0.w
mul r0.x, r0.x, cb2[4].w
sincos r0.x, null, r0.x
mad r0.x, cb2[4].z, r0.x, cb2[5].x
add r0.yzw, -cb2[1].xxyz, cb2[2].xxyz
mad o3.xyz, r0.xxxx, r0.yzwy, cb2[1].xyzx
lt r0.xy, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), cb0[39].zwzz
and r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
if_nz r0.x
  mov o1.xyz, l(0,0,0,0)
else 
  dp3 r0.x, r1.xyzx, r1.xyzx
  rsq r0.x, r0.x
  mul r0.yzw, r0.xxxx, r1.yyzx
  mov r0.x, l(1.000000)
  dp4 r2.x, cb0[38].xyzw, r0.xyzw
  dp4 r2.y, cb0[37].xyzw, r0.xyzw
  dp4 r2.z, cb0[36].xyzw, r0.xyzw
  max r2.xyz, r2.xyzx, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
  mad r4.xy, v0.yxyy, cb4[0].yxyy, cb4[0].wzww
  sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.w, r4.xyxx, t0.xzwy, s0, l(0.000000)
  mad r1.w, r1.w, cb4[2].x, cb4[2].y
  add r1.w, -r1.w, v0.z
  mul_sat r1.w, -r1.w, cb5[18].x
  sqrt r1.w, r1.w
  add r4.xy, v0.xyxx, -cb0[42].xyxx
  dp2 r2.w, r4.xyxx, r4.xyxx
  mad r2.w, cb4[1].x, r2.w, cb4[1].y
  mul_sat r2.w, r2.w, l(3.000000)
  mul r1.w, r1.w, r2.w
  dp4 r4.x, cb5[15].xyzw, r0.xyzw
  dp4 r4.y, cb5[16].xyzw, r0.xyzw
  dp4 r4.z, cb5[17].xyzw, r0.xyzw
  max r0.xyz, r4.xyzx, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
  mad r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, cb0[56].xxxx, -r2.xyzx
  mad o1.xyz, r1.wwww, r0.xyzx, r2.xyzx
endif 

// Relocated to here with asmtool.py
mov o0.xyw, r3.xyxw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed 14e8e9523d7d77ca-vs.txt
ne r6.w, r3.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r6.w
  add r6.w, r3.w, -r6.y
  mad r3.x, r6.w, r6.x, r3.x
endif

mul r0.xyzw, r3.xyww, cb0[34].xyzw
add o5.xy, r0.zwzz, r0.xyxx
dp3 r0.x, cb0[48].xyzx, r1.xyzx
mul o2.w, r0.x, cb0[31].w

// mov o0.xyw, r3.xyxw // Relocated from here with asmtool.py

mov o6.zw, v4.xxxy
mov o4.xyz, v0.xyzx
mov o5.z, r3.w
ret 
// Approximately 78 instruction slots used
